org.apache.twill.discovery

Interface ServiceDiscovered.ChangeListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    ServiceDiscovered

    public static interface ServiceDiscovered.ChangeListener
    Represents a callback for watching changes in the discovery list.
    See Also:
    ServiceDiscovered.watchChanges(ServiceDiscovered.ChangeListener, java.util.concurrent.Executor)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onChange(ServiceDiscovered serviceDiscovered)
      This method will be invoked when the discovery list changed.

    • Method Detail

      • onChange

        void onChange(ServiceDiscovered serviceDiscovered)
        This method will be invoked when the discovery list changed.
        Parameters:
        serviceDiscovered - The ServiceDiscovered that this listener is attached to.
